note:
I am a nerd like my father before me.

I am a code warrior working on transitioning away to a more management role.

I love #tea, #boardgames (including making some of my own based on classical games), #gamester, and #technology. I am in the process of making my own IoT system at home that right now has a rain gauge, which has some bugs I'm working out, and a sensor-alert system, which tells me when my tea water is hot enough.
